revised_title: Synthesis and Properties of Trichloride of Phosphorus Derivatives of Aromatic Monamines
tldr: The author investigates the reaction between trichloride of phosphorus and phenylacetamide, leading to the formation of a new compound. They then explore different variations of the reaction, including using aniline and acetic acid, and propose a general method for producing a variety of similar compounds. The author also discusses the mechanism of the reaction and the properties of the resulting substances.
